description: Stunning picture and lifelike audio come together for an ultimate entertainment viewing experience with our Sceptre E325BV-HDH 31.5-Inch viewable LED HDTV. Get all the performance you need in an elegant and sleek HDTV 720P. It comes with 3 HDMI which let you connect all your favorite High Definition components at once. With a 6.5 response time gives you a crisp and vivid visual performance. Some of the other features this glossy black E325BV-HDH comes in are 1,200:1 typical contrast ratio, all in one ATSC/NTSC/QAM tuner, and a 5.1 Digital Audio Output. Sceptre E325BV-HDH is also energy complied which makes this widescreen television a great bargain.
title: Sceptre E325BV-HDH 32-Inch 720p 60Hz LED HDTV (Black)
